can you ship knuckle sandwiches to hawaii?
Looks like I'm prob going to Hilo for work this week. It will be my first time there.
At ala moana mall doing my patriotic capitalist duty (sarcasm)
Grabbing some spicy Chinese food to combat the crappy weather.
Pricebusters is playing some pretty amazingly awful renditions of Xmas songs.

At party in hawaii kai in Honolulu, HI http://loopt.us/WlXq6g
At a party in Hawaii Kai. Good times.
Yay power still out! Off work.
Experiencing heavy torrential rains and and high winds. Running late to work. Word is power might be out there anyways.
Woke up to high winds and rain. Had to move stuff we were storing in from the lanai. Back to sleep now.
I had a hot chocolate. It were good.
Heros was better than I expected. Waiting for bus to take me home. in Kailua, HI http://loopt.us/3hX7GQ
Watching Heros tonight with diehard fans. Wondering if they can convince me it doesn't suck any more.
Watching history channel modern marvels on vid games. They keep interviewing the CEO of 3DO and calling playstation graphics realistic LOL
Watching "Right at your door" why do I like stressful movies like this?
Anybody else having facebook login issues today or did my account get hacked?

Clarification- managing fileshares sucks, windows mail doesn't play nice export wise. ACLs ad another layer of annoyance.
I never thought this would be possible. Data transfers from Vista to Leopard are actually more difficult than XP transfers.
On the plane. Almost home what a crazy week.
Getting ready for last day at the Hilo store. in Hilo, HI http://loopt.us/CJR2Cg
Wicked tired from last night's volcanic excursions. 8ish hours of work and I'll be flying back home to help prepare for x-mas party.
I saw liquid rock shooting into the sky today. Pretty effing cool. http://loopt.us/Fifn8w
